caption.center: STATE OF DELAWARE v. EARNEST C. PARSON.

court.center: Superior Court of Delaware, New Castle County.

opinion.attorneys: Earnest C. Parson, Sussex Correctional Institution, Georgetown, DE.
opinion.opinion_text:
Mr. Parsons:
I have received your motion for postconviction relief in which you assert that your two felony murder convictions should be vacated pursuant to Williams v. State, 818 A.2d (Del. 2002). The holding inWilliams does not apply to your case because the evidence presented at trial showed that you beat Sam and Esther Sklut to death in order to rob them. That is, you murdered them in furtherance of committing the felony of robbery. See DEL. CODE ANN. tit. 11, ยง 636(a)(2).
Your motion for postconviction relief is Summarily Dismissed.
It Is So ORDERED.Page 1
